lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: As a memorial to my husband, Tom, who died in Oct. 2008.  His mission in life was to open up opportunities for others.  Tom was a writer, highly successful in that he had 13 books published and numerous radio, television and educational film scripts produced.  He had over 150 magazine and newspaper articles and hundreds of photographs published.  He wrote/produced dinner theatre, slide shows and revues, and wrote poetry. Tom kept a journal; in an entry for June 19, 1998 he wrote: "I came to realize how wealthy I am when I count my wealth as those things I have to give to others."  Tom never had much money to give to others--when he did he gave generously--but he always gave of his time, encouragement, knowledgement and leadership. This KIVA portfolio is a means of continuing his mission to help others.

lenders.loan_because: It feels good and it is the right thing to do.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm director of Build a School in Africa, a small non-profit group that raises funds to hrlp build schools in partnership with Save the Children in southern Mali. Since 2005 we have contributed $10,000 each year and have helped to build 4 middle  schools in the Kolondieba district.

lenders.occupational_info: I translate difficult, scientific concepts to managers and publics so we can make effective, balanced decisions on government actions.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back to other entrepreneurs around the world and show them the support they need in order to provide for their families in a way that makes them proud and uses their talents.

lenders.name: Gayle
lenders.loan_because: Small business is the backbone of our economy.  We want to support other small businesses!
lenders.occupational_info: We make building systems (heating, air conditioning) function to its peak ability.

lenders.name: Trina
lenders.loan_because: I have experienced living without a lot of things and currently am unemployed. But even so, I am provided with a government check, a part of which I can use to help someone else build a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently not working, but I am building an online business. I am a crafter/sewer, etc., and am working on designs to launch in the next few months.

lenders.occupational_info: I help people grow their net worth by consulting with them and coming up with new business strategies.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: My dear friend donated the money in lieu of Christmas gift so that I could help others (this is hopefully the first year of many more to come). This has inspired me to do the same in kind to more friends, to make them aware of this wonderful organization and help people who may be less fortunate but are certainly no less important.
lenders.occupational_info: I evaluate and research fine art photography, which eventually are put up for sale at auction.

lenders.name: Creighton Prep
lenders.loan_because: To live out our motto of being "Men for Others."
lenders.occupational_info: Creighton Prep is a Catholic, Jesuit High School in Omaha, NE.

lenders.name: Kimberly Wiefling
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the most effective way to help the world improve is by supporting women in becoming financially independent through starting, running and growing their own businesses.  When we give women economic power we also give them the power to help their families, to have more influence on how many children to have, and to employ other people in their community.  In short, I help women because women help everyone around them.
lenders.occupational_info: Although I consult in the US, especially in my hometown of the Silicon Valley, California, I primarily work with international Japanese companies who are committed to becoming truly global companies.  In fact, I travel to Japan a couple of weeks most months. My customers are determined to  become truly global business leaders.  Global business leaders solve global problems profitably.  My work helps my customers help the world in a profitable way so that they can stay in business to help even more in the future.

lenders.name: Grant
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wildlife ecologist.  I am interested in understanding and conserving wildlife all over the world.
